name: 林顯易
objective:
課程主要內容介紹自動化科技之基礎知識與先進應用技術，並側重在自動化科技相關之專業知識。
This course introduces the fundamental theories and advanced technologies in the field of automatic and advanced technologies. The topics covered mainly in the areas of automation technologies, and related research areas.
schedule:
Week1: Introduction
Week2: Research of robotic polishing (I)
Week3: Research of robotic polishing (II)
Week4: Research of robotic polishing (III)
Week5: Research of robotic polishing (IV)
Week6: Research of robotic polishing (V)
Week7: Research of defect detection (I)
Week8: Research of defect detection (II)
Week9: Mid-term presentation
Week10: Research of defect detection (III)
Week11: Research of defect detection (IV)
Week12: Research of defect detection (V)
Week13: Research of active contact force (I)
Week14: Research of active contact force (II)
Week15: Research of active contact force (III)
Week16: Research of active contact force (IV)
Week17: Research of active contact force (V)
Week18: Final presentation
scorePolicy:
Class discussion 60%
Mid-term presentation 20%
Final presentation 20%
